notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.

taskDescription: Is a nucleus that absorbs at 6.50 δ more shielded or less shielded than a nucleus that absorbs at 3.20 δ? Does the nucleus that absorbs at 6.50 δ require a stronger applied field or a weaker applied field to come into resonance than the one that absorbs at 3.20 δ?
